title: Kash Patel Received Payments from Russian Filmmaker with Kremlin Ties
summary: Trump's FBI director nominee Kash Patel received 25,000 from Igor Lopatonok's Global Tree Pictures for producing an anti-FBI documentary. Lopatonok is a Russian filmmaker with documented Kremlin ties who has promoted pro-Russian views and appeared alongside Putin ally Viktor Medvedchuk.
description: Documents revealed Trump's FBI director pick Kash Patel was paid by a Russian filmmaker with ties to the Kremlin, raising serious concerns about foreign influence and conflicts of interest.
